mapper.select: SELECT seq, m_userid AS username, m_role AS authority FROM tbl_authority
SELECT seq, m_userid AS username, m_role AS authority FROM tbl_authority WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_authority (SEQ, m_userid, m_role) VALUES (SEQ_AUTHORITY.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{authority})

INSERT
INTO tbl_authority (SEQ, m_userid, m_role) VALUES (SEQ_AUTHORITY.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{authority})
